column2: Stienwiek English:Stenwick) is a city in the Dutch province of Overijssel. It is located in the municipality of Steenwijkerland. It is the largest town of the municipality.

column1: Steenwijk received city rights in 1327. In the Eighty Years' War (1568â€“1648) it was conquered by the Spaniards in 1581
column2: but regained by the Dutch in 1592.

column1: Steenwijk was a separate municipality until 2001
column2: when it merged with Brederwiede and IJsselham. The new municipality was first named "Steenwijk"
